pageContext.claim: “It's also the biggest in the world by many, many times. It is really the only currency of -- the euros, they are, a little bit, but the euro is peanuts compared to the dollar. And we have a strong, powerful dollar.”
pageContext.analysis: The Euro is generally regarded as the second strongest currency in the world. At one point, former Federal Reserve Chairman Alan Greenspan thought it could replace the dollar as global currency.
